admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: Energy efficiency in Heat and Power,General public administration sector,General education sector,Telecommunications
trustfund:
TF040827-LITHUANIA: EDUCATION PROJECT,TF038917-LITHUANIA - APPRAISAL,
            PREPARATION OF EDUCATION IMPROVEMENT PROJECT,TF040768-LITHUANIA: EDUCATIONAL
            IMPROVEMENT PROJECT,TF040111-ECA: FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT AND
            OPERATIONAL ANALYSIS,TF039607-LITHUANIA:  EDUCATION REFORM PROJECT,TF026359-PHRD-EDUCATION REFORM PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
In an aim to improve student achievement
            in basic education, and to make a more efficient use of
            financial, human, and physical resources, the Education
            Improvement Project, will support municipalities in
            optimizing school networks, improving energy and space
            utilization, in an initial group of targeted schools. The
            components will: 1) enhance the quality of teaching and
            learning in basic schools, by upgrading teaching skills,
            through active learning strategies, cooperation-based
            methods, and alternative student assessment practices.
            Teaching equipment will be updated in accordance with new
            curriculum demands, and through the use of information and
            communication technologies. Education quality management
            will be enhanced through a Policy Analysis, focused on
            providing reliable information for policy formulation; 2)
            upgrade school facilities, by improving energy efficiency,
            hygiene conditions, and access for the handicapped. School
            networks within municipalities will be optimized, by
            simultaneously improving the quality of teaching and
            learning, through capacity building to local governments,
            and through the establishment of monitoring systems, and
            quality improvement programs; and, 3) support project
            coordination with the Ministry of Education and Science
            (MES), educational institutions, and municipalities. It
            includes procurement, finance, and administrative support.
